name: Tarun Bommawar
summary: Computer Science graduate student with experience in full-stack development, DevOps automation, cloud infrastructure, and machine learning. Skilled in building scalable data-driven applications, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and developing intelligent NLP systems.

bullets: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and microservices in Python and React for data-driven applications, optimizing response times by 30%.
Managed MySQL and Oracle databases for backend systems, developing SQL queries to enhance reporting and business intelligence analytics.
Collaborated in an Agile environment using Jira and Confluence to manage sprints, track deliverables, and ensure feature completeness.
Built PowerBI dashboards and data visualization reports for client insights and KPI monitoring, improving decision-making efficiency.
Automated testing pipelines using Docker and Jenkins, improving build stability and code quality for production releases.
Automated web server deployments (Apache/Nginx) using Ansible playbooks across AWS and GCP environments for scalable hosting.
Developed Bash and Python scripts to monitor server health, GPU utilization, and logs in Linux environments for faster diagnostics.
Configured Hadoop and Hive clusters for distributed data processing, improving automation and reducing manual intervention.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and integration testing via Jenkins to maintain consistent multi-cloud deployments.
Documented DevOps workflows and API integrations in Confluence, enhancing collaboration between development teams.
Developed a reinforcement learning-based system (DQN) to distribute network traffic dynamically across multiple servers.
Leveraged GPU acceleration for faster training, achieving 40% latency reduction and improving resource utilization efficiency.
Deployed Dockerized microservices with Kubernetes, integrating PowerBI visual dashboards for performance insights.
Built an intelligent grading engine using GPT-4 API and Python, providing automated evaluation and feedback in JSON format.
Integrated PowerBI and Excel-based dashboards for reporting and visualization of grading performance metrics.
Reduced manual grading time by 80% while maintaining 95% accuracy through automated analysis and data science techniques.
Developed an end-to-end agentic NLP pipeline (Python, LLMs, Sentence-BERT) to automate resume tailoring, improving skill-coverage accuracy by 15% using FAISS semantic retrieval.
Integrated asynchronous concurrency (asyncio.Semaphore) to process 10+ applications in parallel, achieving a 10x throughput gain over sequential execution.
Conducted baseline vs. agentic model analysis, demonstrating a 30% reduction in hallucination and achieving a 99% validation pass rate using Pydantic schemas.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
details: Coursework: Advanced Natural Language Processing, Software Engineering, Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Systems and Systems Programming, Database Systems, Mathematical Foundations of CS, Theory/Application Data Mining, Network Security, Secure Software Design/Programming

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer and Information Science
education.institution: GH Raisoni Institute of Engineering and Technology
details: Publication: Data Fragmentation for Enhanced Cloud Security - International Journal IJARSCT, 2024

projects.title: AutoResuAgent
projects.description: Automated resume tailoring system using NLP and semantic retrieval
bullets: Built end-to-end NLP pipeline using Sentence-BERT and FAISS for semantic retrieval of relevant experiences
Integrated LLM (GPT-4/Claude) for generating tailored resume bullets and cover letters
Implemented validation layer with hallucination detection and skill coverage metrics
Created LaTeX rendering pipeline for professional PDF output

projects.title: Cloud-Based Data Fragmentation System
projects.description: Secure data fragmentation algorithm for enhanced cloud storage security
bullets: Designed secure data fragmentation algorithm for enhanced cloud storage security
Implemented distributed storage across multiple cloud providers
Published research findings in International Journal IJARSCT

projects.title: RL LoadBalancer

bullets: Developed reinforcement learning-based system (DQN) to distribute network traffic dynamically
Leveraged GPU acceleration for faster training, achieving 40% latency reduction
Deployed Dockerized microservices with Kubernetes for scalable infrastructure
